statements: SELECT * FROM email_tracking;
SELECT email_id, open_rate, timestamp FROM email_tracking WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT MAX(open_rate) AS max_open_rate FROM email_tracking;
SELECT email_id, click_through_rate FROM email_tracking ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT AVG(open_rate) AS avg_open_rate, AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr FROM email_tracking WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT email_id, open_rate, click_through_rate, timestamp FROM email_tracking WHERE open_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT email_id, open_rate, click_through_rate, timestamp FROM email_tracking WHERE click_through_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY open_rate ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT email_id, AVG(open_rate) AS avg_open_rate, AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_click_through_rate FROM email_tracking GROUP BY email_id HAVING avg_open_rate > 0.4;
SELECT email_id, timestamp FROM email_tracking WHERE MONTH(timestamp) = 6 AND YEAR(timestamp) = 2022 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT email_id, open_rate, click_through_rate, timestamp FROM email_tracking WHERE open_rate BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates;
SELECT email_id, open_time, open_location FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY open_time DESC;
SELECT email_id, open_location FROM email_open_rates WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT email_id, click_time FROM email_click_through_rates WHERE click_location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM email_click_through_rates ORDER BY click_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email_id, open_time FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY open_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM email_click_through_rates WHERE click_location = 'USA' AND user_id = 2;
SELECT email_id, click_time FROM email_click_through_rates ORDER BY click_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(email_id) AS total_emails FROM email_open_rates GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_emails > 3;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM email_campaigns JOIN email_click_through_rates ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = email_click_through_rates.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates WHERE open_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, count(*) AS total_open_count FROM email_campaigns JOIN email_open_rates ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = email_open_rates.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_open_count DESC

SELECT email_open_rates.recipient_email, email_click_through_rates.click_date FROM email_open_rates JOIN email_click_through_rates ON email_open_rates.campaign_id = email_click_through_rates.campaign_id WHERE email_click_through_rates.click_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, recipient_email AS open_email FROM email_campaigns JOIN email_open_rates ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = email_open_rates.campaign_id WHERE start_date >= '2021-06-01'
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT email, first_name, last_name FROM users
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_campaigns
SELECT email_id, click_time FROM click_through_rates
SELECT user_id, open_time FROM open_rates
SELECT email, first_name, last_name FROM users;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT email_id, open_time FROM open_rates ORDER BY open_time DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, email, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns JOIN users ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = users.user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS campaign_duration FROM email_campaigns GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY campaign_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, subscription_date FROM email_recipients WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, interaction_date FROM email_campaigns JOIN email_interactions ON email_campaigns.campaign_id = email_interactions.campaign_id;
SELECT recipient_id, open_rate FROM email_interactions JOIN email_open_rates ON email_interactions.interaction_id = email_open_rates.interaction_id ORDER BY open_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT email_address, name FROM email_recipients WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';

SELECT i.interaction_id, e.campaign_name, r.name FROM email_interactions AS i JOIN email_campaigns AS e ON i.campaign_id = e.campaign_id JOIN email_recipients AS r ON i.recipient_id = r.recipient_id WHERE i.interaction_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY i.interaction_date DESC;

SELECT i.interaction_id, o.open_rate, c.click_through_rate FROM email_interactions AS i JOIN email_open_rates AS o ON i.interaction_id = o.interaction_id JOIN email_click_through_rates AS c ON i.interaction_id = c.interaction_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'click' AND o.open_rate > 0.5;
